trans-unit.source: Content is being generated, this may take a moment...
Fill in page metadata or create complete page tree.
Create a whole content element with text and picture or edit an existing content element.
Create a new sepicific picture or edit metadata like alt tag or title tag for an excisting file.
Translate a content element or a whole page with the content inside. You also can translate a files metadata.
Do very special stuff like translating a XLF file or import page content from another system.
Create posts or setup a auto scheduling of post for events.
With the help of AI, you can have a page tree created. This is created with the pages you want.
Create metadata for existing pages, like SEO description, SEO title or title and description for Open Graph tags.
Generate page tree with content as you like.
Advanced page tree creation: Workflow to create a page tree with page metadata and content inside the new pages.
Create content for the current page.
Using AI, you can create content for the currently selected page.
Create content element of type TextPic.
Generate a completely new content for an existing page of type TextPic.
Create content element of type Image.
Generate a completely new content for an existing page of type Image.
Create content element of type Text.
Generate a completely new content for an existing page of type Text.
E.g. to optimize for SEO, or you need in general a better fitting text for a topic. Here you can refactor that text of content element with help of AI.
Create and add new image to existing content element
Add a new AI generated image to an existing content element.
Create a content block skeleton with basic fields in it.
E.g. when you switch from another system to TYPO3, and you have to import / take over excisting content.
Translate an extensions XLF language file in a choosen language. Remember that there has to be a destination directory for the translation.
When you need ideas for a look and feel of a webpage or simply a campaigns landingpage.
When launching a new website, you may need to redirect some old URLs. Crawl the old page (before launch) and get redirect suggestions.
Translate a complete page with page properties and content inside.
Translate a single content element. Remember that there has to be a mapping file for custom content elements.
Translate a single file, e.g. alt and title attributes of a image file.
Create a single image or a set of images for using it as content anywhere.
Create a video via Ai support.
Create e.g. title and alt for images, needed for SEO or accessibility.
The AI Suite provides prompt templates. You can also add your own custom prompt templates. This action only updates the server prompt templates. Your custom prompt templates remain untouched.
With this action, you can edit, delete and create your own prompt templates.
Create me a page structure for [...].
Paste the new structure under the following page:
This module works on the active page, which is selected in the page tree on the left.
Validate your AI result before adding this to your page.
The image prompt. You can refactor the image prompt and reorder a for a new image.
Create new files or file metadata
Support for agencies for the daily work
Validate translations before writing to the file system
Translate the whole file, overwrite existing translations
Work on pages and page tree
Speed up your daily work and get better results from AI by preparing your prompts efficiently.
Generate keywords suggestions for news article (1 Credit)
Generate Open Graph title suggestions (1 Credit)
Generate alternative title suggestions for news article (1 Credit)
Generate Open Graph description suggestions (1 Credit)
Generate description suggestions for news article (1 Credit)

Unfortunately, the OpenAI API is currently not available. Please try again later.
OpenAI verification failed. Maybe you haven't saved your API key in the extension configuration yet?
Page not found. If the page is hidden, please activate it (and possibly deactivate the option "Page in menus activated" within the page properties) so that the page is accessible.
Enter prompt and image generation library
Amout of images to be generated (maximum is 10)
Create new content element with CType

Update prompt templates from server successfully.
Error: Could not fetch prompt templates from server

Please enter your prompt with at least five characters

Selected image will be generated. This may take a while. Please wait...

not found, will create a new one.

The new translations are written to the file system.
Your selected file doesn't have any missing properties
You don't have selected an image for the following field(s):
You can switch between Midjourney versions. Different versions excel at producing different types of images.
Changes the aspect ratio of the generated image. An aspect ratio is the width-to-height ratio of an image.
Tell Midjourney what not to include in your image. Accepts multiple words separated with commas.
Enter web address (URL) where the image is stored. You can use images as style references in your prompt to influence the style or aesthetic of images you want Midjourney to make.
Please run database update (Credits table is missing)
A maximum of two images will be created in the course of the first request. Additional images can then be added at any time.
